code: import*as httpRequest from"../utils/httpRequest";import{notification}from"../components/notification";export const sendMessage=async body=>{try{const response=await httpRequest.post("message/sendmessage",{...body});return response;}catch(error){return error;}};export const getMessage=async()=>{try{const response=await httpRequest.get("message/getemail",{},true);return response;}catch(error){if(error.response.status===403){notification(error.response.data.message,"error","/login");};return error;}};export const updateStatusMessage=async id=>{try{const response=await httpRequest.post("message/updatestatusmessage/".concat(id));return response;}catch(error){if(error.response.status===403){notification(error.response.data.message,"error","/login");};return error;}};export const deleteEmail=async id=>{try{const response=await httpRequest.remote('message/deleteemail',id);return response;}catch(error){if(error.response.status===403){notification(error.response.data.message,"error","/login");};return error;}};export const replyGmail=async(body,id)=>{try{const response=await httpRequest.update("message/reply-email/",body,id,true,'"Content-Type": "application/json"');return response;}catch(error){if(error.response.status===403){notification(error.response.data.message,"error","/login");};return error;}};
